title: How do I get this game to load into a server?
selftext: So I purchased the basic edition to try it out and I've literally blue screened with the same error code every time without a single success. I have uninstalled and reinstalled, checked for updates, moves and dusted the console and I'm for a loss. Im so disappointed with games anymore after being burned on cyberpunk, outriders and now this. I'm about finished wasting my money
